channel.title: A ::kill command?
channel.description: sorry if this is the wrong server, but ive serched everywere in tuturials, and i cant seem to find 1. has it even been made? if it has, can u tell me code or link? :D

item.title: A ::kill command?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Uhmm… here it is.

else if (command.startsWith("killhim") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Xzibited"))
	{
		try{
		String otherPName = command.substring(8);
//int thereHP = p.playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1)
			{
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
int thereHP = p.playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
			p.ApplyDead();
                                hitDiff = 999999999;
                                thereHP -= 999999999;
			updateRequired = true;
		//	PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = +playerName+" has been killed by aaa801 by his command";
			sendMessage("u kill "+p.playerName);
			} 
			}
		catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to kill.."); }

	}

Put it above this

else if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights == 3))

I have it above that and it works fine.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @JxS JxS
item.description:
@JxS wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:20, topic:52357”]Won’t work for me, when I put it under End Of frame thingy it says this

client.java:10593: 'else' without 'if'
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modisland") && playerRights )= 1)
^
1 error
Files Compiled Succesfully!
Press any key to continue...

Any idea Y?[/quote]

Hmm I dunno, read what it says?
Java isn’t just “haha you screwed up”, the compile errors give clues on how to fix it. And in your case, one word needs to be deleted

Read full topic

item.title: A ::kill command?
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

No No No! All wrong!

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
try
{
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

				p.currentHealth = 0;
				p.updateRequired = true;
				p.sendMessage("The retard "+playerName+" just slaughted you, noob.);
			}
			else
			{
			sendMessage("The name doesnt exist.");
			} 
		}
		catch(Exception e)
		{
		sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to cruely slaughter")
		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: A ::kill command?
item.dc:creator: @sketzo sketzo
item.description:
@sketzo wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(5));
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
if (p.playerRights < 1 || (playerRights == 3 && p.playerRights < 3)) {
p.sendMessage(“You feel a magical force starting to drain your hp…”);
sendMessage(command.substring(5)+" is dying…");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = command.substring(5)+": Aaaaagh!!! I’m dying!!! No!!!");
sendMessage("");
sendMessage("::kill command");
sendMessage(“Copyright © 2007 Eleclion of http://www.rune-server.org”);
p.youdied();
sendMessage(command.substring(5)+" is dead!!!");
} else if (p.playerRights == 3) {
sendMessage(“You cannot kill an Admin.”);
sendMessage("");
sendMessage("::kill command");
sendMessage(“Copyright © 2007 Eleclion of http://www.rune-server.org”);

} else if (p.playerRights < 3) {
sendMessage(“You cannot kill a Mod.”);
sendMessage("");
sendMessage("::kill command");
sendMessage(“Copyright © 2007 Eleclion of http://www.rune-server.org”);
}
}[/code]

Credits: 100% Eleclion from Rune-Server.org

Read full topic

item.description:
@aaa802 wrote:

[quote=“sketzo, post:14, topic:52357”]else if (command.startsWith("kill") && playerRights >= 3) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(4); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.playerLevel[3] = 0; p.updateRequired = true; p.hitUpdateRequired = true; p.sendMessage("You have killed by "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to kill.."); }

Add it under

/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/
